title: Central Contemporary Pontianak Escape with Restaurant, Bar & Outdoor Pool
description:
Discover unparalleled comfort and style at this contemporary haven in the heart of West Kalimantan's bustling capital. With spacious rooms boasting tranquil designs, the hotel offers a stylish retreat, just moments from Pontianak's thriving shopping district and cultural attractions.

Savour authentic Indonesian cuisine at onsite Ebony Restaurant, or sip on a refreshing drink at the sophisticated bar. For a dose of local culture, visit the nearby Dayak Longhouse Replica or explore the city's rich culinary scene. Whether here for work or leisure, experience a seamless blend of modern luxury and local charm from your gateway to wonders of the city.
offer_address: Jalal Jenderal Ahmad Yani No.91, Bansir Laut, Pontianak Tenggara, Pontianak, Kalimantan Barat, 78124, Indonesia
